person1.description: When Alba is not hard at work studying Transportation Engineering, she loves skiing on Oare mountain.

person2.description: Evalyn studied Environmental Science at McGill University in Montreal. She likes snowboarding, interior canoeing, and scuba diving.

person3.description: Ahmed is passionate about football and learning new languages. He believes in random acts of kindness, and has a special interest in accents and dialects.

person4.description: Hailing from Sweden, Leo loves philosophizing by the (relatively) cold Scandinavian seaside. He is also a budding poker shark.

person5.description: After his first career as a pro footballer in Egypt, Mostafa turned his sights on a career with a lower probability of injury: Geoinformatics. He also loves cooking for friends and travelling.
